description: The bed buddy pocket warmers are ideal for those with cold hands. Treat your hands and senses to the soothing warmth of moist heat. Lightly scented with comforting eucalyptus, clove and cinnamon aromatherapy to ease stress and tension. These pocket warmers can be warmed in the microwave for gentle heat or chilled to use as a cooling compress.
